text: pitabrakd nasa puok del brachheang nung a l laoh ning banda anakneasar robsa trong haey puokke chng bengchek rveang a l laoh ning banda anakneasar robsa trong haey puokke niyeay tha puok yeung mean chomnue leu anakneasar muoychamnuon ning bdeseth muoychamnuon . haey puokke chng chreusareusa yk meakra muoy rveang rueng noh (mean chomnue ning kmean chomnue)
